After the Music, the Ainur entered Eä, becoming known as Valar, powerful, wise, benevolent beings tasked with shaping and governing Eä.

**The Silmarils: Three Jewels of Fëanor**
Fëanor crafted three radiant jewels, Silmarils, the pinnacle of his craftsmanship.

**The Valar and the Shaping of Middle-earth**
Ilúvatar ended the Music and brought forth the Ainur into Eä.

**The Valar (Powers) and the Shaping of Eä**
After the Music,Ilúvatar brought forth the Valar (powers).

**The Valar (Powers of the World)** 
After the Music, Ilúvatar brought forth the Valar, 15 powerful Ainur chosen to shape and govern Eä.

**The Valar (Powers of the World)** 
During the Music, the most powerful Ainur became the Valar.
